full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Notice Information

* Title: F1688-230003-B, Aluminum Tri-Axle Vessel Trailer
* Reference Number: WS4146646395-Doc4329206321
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: WS4146646395
* Publication Date: November 29, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: December 6, 2023 at 14:00

## Notice Status

* Status: Expiré (Expired)
* Notice Type: Demande de propositions (Request for Proposal)
* Procurement Method: Concurrentielle - Appel d'offres sélectif (Competitive - Selective tendering)

## Procurement Details

* Procurement Category: *GC (Goods)
* UNSPSC Code: *25101907 (Trailer, travel or caravan)
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2025
* Regions of Delivery: *British Columbia
* Trade Agreements: *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contact Information

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entity: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
* Contact Person: Wong, Katie (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: katie.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Contact Phone: None

## Tender Description

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is for a limited tender for the procurement of a vessel-specific fitting of one (1) tri-axle aluminum trailer. The trailer will be delivered to Fisheries and Oceans Canada, 4222 Columbia Valley Hwy, Cultus Lake, BC, V2R 5B6. All deliverables must be received on or before March 31, 2024. Suppliers have been pre-selected and invited to bid on this tender.

A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who have participated in the previous solicitation. Through this RFP, Fisheries and Oceans Canada is seeking a qualified supplier to provide a tri-axle aluminum trailer that meets their specific requirements.
